title: Land Acquisition Architect

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Ink Drain- (Night) Target a player. The next day, they are limited to only 10 messages/whispers in day chat.
Shady Acquisition!- (Night) [Cheat] Use in conjunction with the factional attack. If you successfully kill your target, you will gain one charge of a random ability they had.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Drained players may still receive whispers and vote after their 10 messages are used.
-You may not gain any conversion or abilities that would instantly end the game from Shady Acquisition!
